results.title: The Expedition of T. Mitchell
results.brief_description:
The arrival of T.Mitchell from the United Kingdom to Australia with convicts in tow. Subsequently one morning, T.Mitchell awoke to find his camp robbed by the convicts.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: The End of one
results.brief_description: A wordless parable of modern society in which masses of seagulls fighting for growing mounds of garbage are intercut with the final feeble movements of a single dying bird while tractors and jet planes roar in the distance

results.title: The Electronic telephone
results.brief_description: This short film is about telecommunications, silicon technology, and the E-phone and Bell’s role in its development. The E-phone is the world’s first fully electronic telephone. Chips utilized in it were designed by Bell Northern Research in Ottawa. Northern Telecom makes 256 phones an hour, on one production line alone. As Canada changes, the telephone changes with it and this film includes historical glimpses with a montage of shots from a telephone museum.

results.title: The Eiffel Tower
results.creator_credit: Alain Pol and Le Monde en Images
results.brief_description: How four French alpinists climbed the Eiffel Tower - from the outside. Using rock climbing techniques, the party scales the steel girders to the top, 1,000 feet above ground level. In hot pursuit, an angry policeman ascends the tower by the more conventional stairs and lifts, but to no avail.

results.title: The Egg of oryzias latipes
results.brief_description: Artificial fertilization of the killifish. through constant research a method of artificial fertilization of the transparent eggs of killifish or oryzias latipes, in Ringer’s solution was discovered. The delayed-action camera shows the process observed through the microscope.

results.title: The Ecology of agriculture
results.creator_credit: Agricultural Council of Denmark and Naturfoto
results.brief_description: Aims to promote the use of various agricultural methods which emphasise the scientific approach. Notes the importance of nutrients in the soil: the damage caused by mildew and pests; the need for the use of sprays; the damage caused by excessive spraying; and the development of strains of pests resistant to sprays.

results.title: The Duties of a secretary
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the duties of a secretary and shows how they should be carried out to ensure maximum efficiency in the office. Shows correct and incorrect methods of handling a job, the wrong methods being demonstrated in a dream which a young secretary experiences on the eve of beginning a new job.

results.title: The Drinking man
results.brief_description: When I reached fifty I thought I would be all one piece. I am nothing like my mother but like her I tied my star to drinking man.

results.title: The Dresden Cross Choir in its hometown = Der Dresdener Kreushor in seiner heimatstadt
results.brief_description: The Dresden Choir consists of 80 young men and boys ranging from10-20 years old and has been in existence from 156 years. Shots of the city of Dresden are interspersed with those of the Choir singing in concerts, practising and relaxing.
